title: website: Redirect https://golang.org/s/ to https://code.google.com/p/go-wiki/wiki/DesignDocuments
body:
by **michael.schurter**: 
https://golang.org/s/ shortlinks are handy, but if you dare forget which document a plan
was laid out in it's very difficult to find again.

https://code.google.com/p/go-wiki/wiki/DesignDocuments is a great list, but difficult to
discover if you're used to /s/ shortlinks.

Currently https://golang.org/s/ 404s, but if it redirected to the index in the wiki it
would make design docs a lot more discoverable.

Or not. Not really going to lose sleep on this one.
